## UpdateTaskRequest type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UpdateTaskRequest = {
    name: string;
    listIds?: Array<string>;
    description?: string;
    status?: string;
    assigneesIds?: Array<string>;
    parentTaskId?: string;
    fields?: Array<{
        fieldTemplateId: string;
        value?: string;
        date?: string;
        labels?: Array<string>;
        linkedTasks?: Array<{
            id?: string;
            index?: number;
        }>;
    }>;
};
```
